A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's not an 80s Star Wars story done in today's style\, it's a present day Star Wars story done present day style.\nThe Force Awakens was a shining example of the former\, to wonderful effect\, which I completely enjoyed.  But The Last Jedi finally shows that Star Wars can thrive without being married to the old formula\, the way modern TV breaks all of the old archetypes\, and is more interesting for it.
